extracted_playbook.title: Exchange project data securely
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that project data is exchanged only via secure exchange services to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect project storage
extracted_playbook.description: Use appropriate means to protect the project storage from unauthorized manipulation.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid opening unknown project data
extracted_playbook.description: Do not open project data from an unknown source to prevent potential security risks.

extracted_playbook.title: Reduce user rights
extracted_playbook.description: Reduce the user rights of the host application to the necessary minimum to limit potential exploitation.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which update option to choose for fdtCONTAINER component/application?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to secure deserialization version (Option 1)
extracted_playbook.description: Update the fdtCONTAINER component/application to a version that provides a more secure deserialization of the project data, compatible with existing files.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to secure deserialization version with updated technology (Option 2)
extracted_playbook.description: Update the fdtCONTAINER component/application to a version that provides secure deserialization with updated serialization technology, breaking compatibility with existing files.
